definition: to cook on a slow fire/to extract by heating/to decoct/to endure
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison

sentences.english: Rescue Liu Zhong Cao Wenqian good people to do what, not only, also helped him get medicine.
sentences.chinese: 曹文謙好人做到底，不僅救出劉忠，還幫他熬藥。

sentences.english: Can I use a steel pan?
sentences.chinese: 我能用普通的鋼製鍋熬藥嗎？
